page.title: 05ECOLOGY.
page.content: The climate is very mild.In winter we get very little snow,but we do get a lot of rain.Summer is warm,with showers. Not a large amount of active conservation is done because the area does not lend itself to large scale development. There is slight pollution of the rivers due to rain leeching out artificial fertilizer,but many farmers stick to the old-fashioned 'muck' spreading. There are several public footpaths, all well signposted.Our block contains part of the Ribble Way long distance footpath.
